trans:
How can I subscribe to electronic notifications?
What is the deadline?
Following the communication/change of address with the Citizen Card Services, it has been verified that your habitual residence (tax domicile) is in a country outside the European Union (EU), Norway, Iceland or Liechtenstein.
While residing in that country and whenever you are or become subject to a tax legal relationship, namely:
• If you are or become the owner of a vehicle and/or of a property registered/located in Portuguese territory
• If you engage or come to engage in a self-employed activity in Portuguese territory
You are required to appoint a tax representative, pursuant to Article 19, paragraph 6, of the General Tax Law, the representative may be an individual or a legal entity with a residence or registered office in Portuguese territory.
